text:
="preserve">Paul David Sirba (September 2, 1960 – December 1, 2019) was an American prelate of the Roman Catholic Church. He was bishop of the Diocese of Duluth, Minnesota from 2009 until his death. He was born in Saint Paul, Minnesota.
Sirba died on December 1, 2019 in Duluth, Minnesota of a heart attack at the age of 59.
